caption.p: Comparison of MBCs of Palm Rosa oil and its major component Geraniol. a to e: Comparison of minimum bactericidal concentration values of palm rosa oil and its major component geraniol, with antibiotics viz- ciprofloxacin, gentamicin, ampicillin, streptomycin and chloramphenicol respectively against various Gram + & Gram –ve bacteria. The inverses of MBC values are represented in the figures to have a better presentation.
